Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a game-tying two-run home run in the 8th inning
Jhonkensy Noel hit a walk-off two-run home run in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed frustration over the loss
Luke Weaver felt responsible for the close loss
Aaron Boone reflected on the game as a tough outcome
Miscellaneous Highlights: Clay Holmes had a long scoreless postseason streak before the loss
The game marked the Yankees' best chance to end a 15-year World Series drought
